data.title: Honor Roll of Donors
data.meta_description: Catawba College is ranked #4 among the best colleges in the South. Located in historic Salisbury, NC, it is a private, coeducational liberal arts college established in 1851. Our mission is to enrich the educational experiences of students and to prepare them for productive, meaningful lives of purpose. Our campus consists of over 30 buildings on 276 acres, a beautiful blend of neogothic architecture set on a shaded hillside adjacent to its own ecological preserve. We are just two hours from the Appalachian Mountains and four hours away from some of the best beaches on the Atlantic Coast.
data.text:
Dear Alumni and Friends,

On behalf of the entire Catawba College community I want to express my gratitude for your remarkable support during the 2020-21 academic year.

Your gifts enable us to enact Catawba's mission and values and serve our students in ways that would not otherwise be possible apart from your generosity.

Thank you for your support.
